title: InsightViz
description: Web-based data visualization tool built with Django, Pandas, and Matplotlib. Offers advanced filtering and a user-friendly interface for analysts and students.

title: AudioWave
description: Full-stack music streaming application with JWT authentication, React frontend, MongoDB backend, and Spotify API integration.

title: AI Sentiment Analyzer
description: Advanced sentiment analysis web application using Flask, LangChain, and Ollama with batch input support and word cloud visualizations.

title: Weather Prediction Model
description: Machine learning model using Random Forest algorithm for weather prediction with 99.49% accuracy. Includes comprehensive EDA on historical weather data.

title: Cardiovascular Risk Prediction
description: Clinical machine learning project using diagnostic analytics for heart disease prediction with advanced data preprocessing and model optimization.
